publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6339 Helen Eadie: Congratulations to Cowdenbeath Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates Cowdenbeath Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish First Division; hails the achievement of Danny Lennon’s team after a difficult year for the club, and hopes for continued success for the club in the new season.
S3M-6339 Congratulations to Cowdenbeath Football Team (lodged on 18 May 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6339 Congratulations to Cowdenbeath Football Team (lodged on 18 May 2010) Dr Richard Simpson*, John Park*

S3M-6339 Helen Eadie: Congratulations to Cowdenbeath Football Team—That the Parliament congratulates Cowdenbeath Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish First Division; hails the achievement of Danny Lennon’s team after a difficult year for the club, and hopes for continued success for the club in the new season. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Dr Richard Simpson, John Park
